name: Follow the Black Kitten
description:
You buy a laptop on the local flea market. You find an interactive collection of short stories on your laptop and something else. Or someone?
What will all this lead to? You'll find out by playing this visual novel.


  • Several stories inside, unrelated to the main storyline;
  • Workshop and your own story loader;
  • A short visual novel with an interesting plot;
  • Pixel-style graphics, complemented by authentic sound when outputting text (optional);
  • The text is written in such a way that it can be read equally both on behalf of the girl and on behalf of the guy;
  • A Rock-Paper-Scissors mini-game with animated characters.
